summary: Part crime caper gone awry, part survival horror film, this 1970s set thriller depicts a harrowing fight for survival after a pair of wannabe crooks botch a bank heist and flee into the ... See full summary »
cast: Ashley Bell|Pat Healy|James Landry Hébert|Michael Villar|Bob Bancroft|Larry Fessenden|Graham Skipper|Darby Stanchfield|Alan Ruck|Andy Greene
title: Carnage Park
